summary: Discussion on two upcoming projects: an AI-powered customer support chatbot and a cloud-based inventory management system for warehouse operation. Deployment of MVP version of the chatbot within four weeks, and compilation of the inventory management system in about six weeks.

tasks.task: Develop MVP version of AI-powered customer support chatbot
tasks.sentence: Integrate with CRM system, handle real-time queries using natural language processing. Deploy within four weeks.

tasks.task: Develop cloud-based inventory management system for warehouse operation
tasks.sentence: Support automated restocking alerts, barcode scanning, integration, and detailed analytics dashboards. Compile in about six weeks.
